parameters.name: DedicatedHostClusterIds
parameters.description: The IDs of dedicated host clusters. The value can be a JSON array that consists of up to 100 dedicated host cluster IDs in the format of `["dc-xxxxxxxxx", "dc-yyyyyyyyy", ... "dc-zzzzzzzzz"]`. Separate the IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: DedicatedHostClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated host cluster.

parameters.name: LockReason
parameters.description: >  This parameter is unavailable for use.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Maximum value: 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the dedicated host cluster. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the dedicated host cluster belongs. If this parameter is specified to query resources, up to 1,000 resources that belong to the specified resource group can be displayed in the response.  

>  Resources in the default resource group are displayed in the response regardless of how this parameter is set.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: >  This parameter is unavailable for use.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the dedicated host cluster. You can call the [DescribeZones](~~25610~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
